{"blocks":[{"key":"7i0j2","text":"Wash 4x   with PBS-T (0.05%), in black box or aluminium foil.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9518u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"E8B999A0B97211EBBB6713C305497CE8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1qbt0","text":"Wash 1x   with PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6e1d6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"ED601740B97211EBBB6713C305497CE8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bqajl","text":"Change to fresh PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4r6tc","text":"Immediately before acquisition, dry membranes on kimwipe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7cnit","text":"Reassemble membrane and scan with Licor Clx scanner.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mf0e","text":"Flip membranes so that lower left corner is in upper left.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"41jf7","text":"Analysis: LC3 II normalized over Actin (or LC3 I), then divided by baseline (DMSO condition).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4gq92","text":"LC3 II is larger than LC3 I, but charge makes it run faster: ratio is lower band divided by upper band (or Actin).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pja5","text":"Normalize p62 over Actin to corroborate LC3.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Lysosomal flux assay
